name: nelbrnelim

stmt.origin: sylibr(wbr(c0, cnelbr, c1), wnel(c0, c1), wn(wcel(c0, c1)))

body.origin:

comment: If a set is related to another set by the negated membership relation, then it is not a member of the other set. (Contributed by AV, 26-Dec-2021.)
